00016 FileExtraTab::FileExtraTab(const QFileInfo& baseLocation, 
00017                                                    File* file, 
00018                                                    QWidget *parent ):
00019 QWidget(parent), dependencies_(tr("Dependencies"), baseLocation, this),
00020 exportedNames_(tr("Exported names"), this),
00021 imageTypes_(tr("Image types"), this),
00022 defineView_(this),
00023 defineModel_(this, file),
00024 file_(file) {
00025 
00026         // create a proxy model to sort the define items and connect it between
00027         // the defineView and defineModel
00028         QSortFilterProxyModel* proxy = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00029         proxy->setSourceModel(&defineModel_);
00030         defineView_.setModel(proxy);
00031 
00032         QGroupBox* defineBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Defines"), this);
00033         QVBoxLayout* groupLayout = new QVBoxLayout(defineBox);
00034         groupLayout->addWidget(&defineView_);
00035 
00036         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00037         layout->addWidget(&dependencies_, 0, 0, 1, 2);
00038         layout->addWidget(&exportedNames_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00039         layout->addWidget(&imageTypes_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00040         layout->addWidget(defineBox, 2, 0, 1, 2);
00041 
00042         connect(&dependencies_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00043                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044         connect(&exportedNames_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00045                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00046         connect(&imageTypes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00047                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048         // TODO add signal from definemodel
00049 
00050 }

00052 FileExtraTab::~FileExtraTab() {
00053 
00054 }
00055 
00056 void FileExtraTab::apply() {
00057         file_->setDependencies(dependencies_.items());
00058         file_->setExportedNames(exportedNames_.items());
00059         file_->setImageTypes(imageTypes_.items());
00060 }
00061 
00062 void FileExtraTab::restore() {
00063         dependencies_.setItems(file_->getDependencies());
00064         exportedNames_.setItems(file_->getExportedNames());
00065         imageTypes_.setItems(file_->getImageTypes());
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool FileExtraTab::isValid() const {
00069  return true;
00070 }
